dct_title_s: Leonard's chronological and geographical family guide to the Bible
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and pictorially.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Miles".
3 illustrations of family trees: Kings of Judah -- Kings of Israel -- Jacob.
Shows topography, drainage, territorial boundaries of the tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Descriptive text throughout and around margins, e.g.: [Chronology and genealogy of the Bible].
